rooms.description: Entrance hall with reception area; aligns with Vastu entry principles.
Spacious living room adjacent to central courtyard for natural light and ventilation.
Modern kitchen with ample storage; follows Vastu principles with south-east direction recommended.
Dining area integrated with living room; designed for family gatherings.
First studio apartment with private balcony; aligned with north-west region as per Vastu.
Spacious master bedroom with private balcony; positioned in north-west direction.
Private bathroom adjacent to master bedroom; designed per Vastu for relaxation and rejuvenation.
